description:
njmon data gathers for Linux on any platform: AMD64, POWER8/9, Raspberry Pi and any Linux version
Includes 14 graphs of the regular CPU, memory, disks, filesystems and networks plus memory Pie charts and table view of memory extra stats.

targets.query: SELECT "name" +  "version" FROM "os_release" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$LINUXHOST$/) AND $timeFilter

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "host" WHERE "os" != 'AIX'
